title: Gmail Assistant Configuration
description: Configuration schema for Gmail Assistant v2.0.0

credentials_path.description: Path to Google OAuth credentials JSON file. Relative paths resolved from config file location. Supports ~ expansion.

token_path.description: Path to store OAuth token after authentication. Relative paths resolved from config file location. Supports ~ expansion.

output_dir.description: Directory for email backups and exports. Relative paths resolved from config file location. Supports ~ expansion.

max_emails.description: Maximum number of emails to fetch per operation.
